GPUCompilationMessageLength.summary:
NOTE Experimental The length read-only property of the
interface is a number representing the length of the substring that the message corresponds to.
GPUCompilationMessageLength.value: A number.To be precise, length is the number of UTF-16 code units in the shader code substring that the message corresponds to. If the message corresponds to a single point rather than a substring, length will be 0.
